# curse ≠ course

𒌅𒃲𒌓 tu-rab-tu "ᵗcurse" <> corpse

𓍲 𓈖 𓏮 𓀁 | curse | shun? ⇔ schimpfen
𓊹 𓌨 | curse

𓎡 𓋴 𓎡 𓋴 𓀁 | bend | cursed:curved ϥⲉⲛⲧ worm ⲁⲕⲓⲛⲟⲥ ⲁⲯⲓⲛ

𓈎 𓂋 𓋴 𓌟 𓀄 | burial | curse™
𓈎 𓂋 𓋴 𓌟 𓀜 | bury | kurgan!! / curse™ qabaru qbara qboro to bury +++ course cure
𓈎 𓂋 𓋴 𓌟 𓁀 | bury | curse™ kurgan
𓈎 𓂋 𓋴 𓌟 𓂝 𓊭 | bury | curse™ kurgan

𓋴 𓐍 𓏏 𓌦 𓂡 | snare | Schlinge™
𓋴 𓐍 𓏏 𓌦 𓂡 | snare | scurta > cursă ⇔ Kreis circle
𓋴 𓐍 𓏏 𓌦 𓂡 | snare | 𓍶 SchnUr/Schnörkel 𓍲𓈖𓏌𓅱𓍶

𒄯𒋢 mur-su disease, illness 𓏱 (sic)
𒄯𒋢 •cur-su •curse
